auth.klaGoogleOnlyNotice: KLA students and staff must sign in with Google.
auth.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

auth.visitorHint: Do not use your school Google account. Use the partner or administrator-provided email.
auth.passwordPolicyHint: Use at least 8 characters. Avoid common phrases.
auth.additionalStepRequired: Additional verification required. Contact an administrator if this persists.
auth.resetCodeSent: We sent a verification code to your email.
auth.welcomeSubtitle: Access the tools and resources prepared for our community.
auth.compliance: We respect your privacy. Data is processed according to our Privacy Policy.
auth.completeSetup: Complete setup: set new password & name

roleAssignments.title: Manage user accounts
roleAssignments.subtitle: Create accounts ahead of first sign-in and manage the roles that flow into Cognito tokens.
roleAssignments.formHelp: Separate multiple entries with commas, spaces, or new lines.
roleAssignments.primaryEmailLocked: Email is the identifier for this account and cannot be changed here.
roleAssignments.rolesRequired: Please add at least one role.
roleAssignments.emailExists: An account with this email already exists. Click Edit to update it instead.
roleAssignments.previewHint: Showing the latest {{count}} accounts. Open the full list to see everything.
roleAssignments.modalDescription: Search and browse every account in the registry.
roleAssignments.importingStatus: Import started... validating rows and updating accounts.
roleAssignments.importEmpty: The selected CSV file is empty.
roleAssignments.importModalDescription: Upload a CSV to create or update accounts.
roleAssignments.importModalHint: Use the template so the headers match: primaryEmail, roles, notes.
roleAssignments.importModalFooter: Selected rows will overwrite existing accounts.
roleAssignments.syncStatusNoData: Sync completed, but no summary was returned.
roleAssignments.syncStatusTotals: Cognito users scanned: {{total}} | Assignments before: {{before}} | After: {{after}}
roleAssignments.syncConfirmDescription: This will scan the Cognito user pool for invited accounts that are missing from the registry. Continue?
roleAssignments.empty: No accounts yet. Use the form above to pre-provision access.
roleAssignments.tableHelp: Tokens pick up updates on the next login. Remove an entry to revoke access.
roleAssignments.editing: Editing {{email}}. Update account details and save.

studentProfiles.title: Student profiles
studentProfiles.subtitle: Manage student records and parent contact information.
studentProfiles.errorNoProfile: The server did not return the saved profile.

import.title: Import student profiles
import.description: Upload a CSV file to create or update student profiles in bulk.
import.instructionsBody: Download the template, populate it with student details, then upload the CSV here. Use DD/MM/YYYY (slashes, dashes, periods, or commas) for birth dates.
import.moreErrors: Resolve the remaining errors in the CSV and try again.
import.moreReady: Additional rows are ready to import.
import.hint: Only rows with valid data will be upserted.
import.completedHint: Import finished. You can close this window.

errors.emptyFile: The selected CSV file is empty.
errors.readFailed: Could not read the CSV file.
errors.noRows: Select a CSV file to continue.
errors.resolveIssues: Resolve the highlighted rows before importing.
errors.noUserAccount: No matching user account found. Create the account first.

studentProfiles.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This cannot be undone.
